examples.example: 春天到了，山上的蕨菜长得十分茂盛，吸引了很多人去采摘。

translate.english: Spring has come, and the bracken on the mountains grows very lushly, attracting many people to go pick.

examples.example: 周末我们一家人去郊外游玩，惊喜地发现那里有很多鲜嫩的蕨菜。

translate.english: On the weekend, our family went to the suburbs to play and were pleasantly surprised to find that there were a lot of tender fiddleheads there.

examples.example: 我们在山林中愉快地采摘着鲜嫩的蕨菜，感受着大自然的美好馈赠。

translate.english: We are happily picking the tender fiddleheads in the mountain forest, feeling the wonderful gift of nature.
